title: Episode 161 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode details including Japanese title, air dates, plot summary, character appearances, production credits, manga chapters covered, and trivia. TV rating of 10.1% confirmed.

title: Satori - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed information about Satori's character, abilities (Mantra, Impact Dial), Ordeal of Balls mechanics, and role as one of Enel's priests. Confirmed 10% survival rate.

title: Aisa - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character information for Aisa including her debut in episode 161, natural Mantra ability, and status as youngest character shown with Observation Haki. Voice actor: Rei Sakuma.

title: Shura - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Shura's debut in episode 161, his role as priest of the Ordeal of String (3% survival rate), Heat Javelin weapon, and bird mount Fuza.

title: Skypiea Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Arc overview confirming episode 161 is part of the Skypiea Arc within the Sky Island Saga. Episodes 153-195, chapters 237-302.

title: Chapter 247 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Manga chapter information. Episode 161 adapts Chapter 247 pages 7-19, titled 'Trial of Balls'. Details battle events and Shura's arrival.

title: Ordeals - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the four ordeals in Skypiea, including Satori's Ordeal of Balls (10% survival rate) and Shura's Ordeal of String (3% survival rate).

title: Hikari e - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Opening song information. 'Hikari e' by The Babystars, episodes 116-168. English version by Vic Mignogna for Funimation dub.

title: FAITH - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Ending song information. 'FAITH' by Ruppina, episodes 157-168. English version by Caitlin Glass.

title: Observation Haki - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Confirmed that Mantra is the Skypiean name for Observation Haki. Satori's use in this episode represents early introduction of this power system.

title: One Piece - Episode 161 (Official Stream)
author: Toei Animation
notes: Official streaming source for episode verification. Available since April 12, 2014 on Crunchyroll.

title: Episodes 160-161 Review
author: Never Watched One Piece
notes: First-time viewer perspective on episodes 160-161, providing fan reaction context to Satori battle and Mantra reveal.

title: Revisiting Skypiea: Essential Episodes and Underrated Gems
author: ChibiBytes Editorial
notes: Analysis of Skypiea arc's importance. Notes how Mantra introduced in episodes like 161 became central as Observation Haki later.

title: One Piece: Why Skypiea Is The Most Crucial Arc
author: GameRant Editorial
notes: Analysis explaining Skypiea's long-term importance, including introduction of Observation Haki via Mantra and other foreshadowing elements.

title: Skypiea Is the Arc You Either Love or Hate
author: CBR Editorial
notes: Discussion of why Skypiea arc is divisive among fans, noting pacing issues but acknowledging importance.

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial
notes: Comprehensive arc recap and review, rating 7/10. Discusses priests' ordeals including Satori's battle.
